name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer with over 9 years of expertise, I specialize in designing and building scalable software solutions. I excel in **cloud services**, **Agile methodologies**, and **cross-functional team leadership**, delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience and innovation. My strong track record in mentoring junior engineers enhances team dynamics and fosters a culture of technical excellence. I am dedicated to enhancing accessibility and driving performance in all aspects of software development, leveraging my skills to create user-centric applications.

experience.responsibilities:
• Lead the development of key services within cloud-based applications, utilizing **Java**, **Microservices Architecture**, and **REST API** design.
• Designed and developed a Hybrid-single Page Application using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React 17**, and **Redux 4.2.1**.
• Enhanced the React Observables with **Redux**, **React-router**, and **Redux-thunk** to improve data handling in applications.
• Developed the user interface with **React HOC**, **Flux/Redux** for optimal SPA development.
• Worked on the UI layer using **Angular 14**, **HTML5**, **CSS**, and **Bootstrap** to build 10+ rich, flexible, interactive web pages.
• Hands-on experience with **Core Java** including **Multithreading**, **Concurrency**, **File Handling I/O**, **Generics**, **Data Structures**, and **Collections**, ensuring efficient operations.
• Utilized **Node.js**, **MongoDB**, and **npm** for installing dependencies and running applications in a web server within a staging environment.
• Experienced with RDBMS implementation and development using **Oracle**, **MySQL**, **MS SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, handling databases with over 500K records.
• Automated **Docker** image deployment to development and production environments using **Jenkins** and **Ansible**, achieving deployment time reduction by 20%.

• Developed scalable web applications using **Spring MVC**, incorporating **JSP**, **JSTL**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, **jQuery**, **AJAX**, and **AngularJS**.
• Designed and implemented **Model View Controller (MVC)** architecture using **Spring Framework** (version 5.x) and crafted **Hibernate** classes and **DAO** patterns for data operations, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage.
• Leveraged **Spring Core** annotations for effective Dependency Injection and utilized **Spring Boot** for developing robust Microservices and **REST APIs** 
• Created a web application using **React 12** for the front-end, utilizing **Web API** to seamlessly connect front-end and back-end components, facilitating data exchange.
• Developed reusable modules and custom directives in **Angular 12 & 13**, enhancing development efficiency across various parts of the application.
• Implemented **Web Sockets** for enabling real-time bidirectional communication, ensuring a responsive user experience.
• Designed and integrated a dynamic dashboard using **ChartJS** with user authentication implemented via **Auth Guards**, enhancing security by protecting sensitive data.
• Crafted dynamic, multi-browser compatible web sites using **React JS**, **Ext JS**, **AJAX**, **Grunt**, **JSON**, and conducted extensive testing to ensure cross-browser functionality.

• Developed web applications utilizing **Spring MVC**, **jQuery**, **HTML**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **Web Forms**, **Material UI**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **AJAX** controls, ensuring alignment with the latest standards and best practices.  
• Implemented client-side validation through **jQuery** to enhance user experience, contributing to a **30%** reduction in submission errors.  
• Transformed designs from **Photoshop** and **Figma** into table-less semantic **XHTML** and **CSS**, increasing page load efficiency by **15%**.  
• Developed and implemented **CORS** using **Node.js**, creating **REST** services with **Node** and **Express** to facilitate seamless interactions between frontend and backend systems.  
• Designed and executed **SSIS** packages for data export from flat file sources to **MS SQL Server**, improving data processing time by **25%**.  
• Gained expertise with various web technologies and tools including **Bower**, **NPM**, **Git**, and **Material Design**, along with cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**, contributing to a robust and scalable infrastructure.
